Title: Provides residential electric customers with an option for greater control of the cost of such service by installing real time smart meters
Summary: Provides residential electric customers with an option for greater control of the cost of such service by the installation of real time smart meters; establishes sales, rental and service providers to be certified by the public service commission.
LawCode: Add ยง39-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing real time smart metering technology to residential electricity customers
